snippet: A City Council committee sent the full Council a measure that would make possessing marijuana a civil, not criminal, violation.
abstract: District of Columbia moves closer to easing restrictions on marijuana as city lawmakers advance a measure that would decriminalize possession of up to once ounce of the drug.
lead_paragraph: A City Council committee sent the full Council a measure that would make possessing marijuana a civil, not criminal, violation.

headline.main: D.C. Lawmakers Advance Measure to Loosen Marijuana Law
headline.print_headline: District Moves Closer to Easing Marijuana Laws
